Unlock the Power of Your Client’s Data: Drive Revenue and Attract New Clients with Ease

You have the client’s lists and data, but you’re not sure how to use them to drive more revenue and attract new clients.

Relying on an email platform to analyse your customer data means you’re the same as everyone else.

You need a solution that…

  • Sets you apart from the crowd

  • Is simple and effective

  • Can work without your input.

Revolutionise Your Agency’s Revenue: Leverage Existing Data with Expert Help

You can use existing data to differentiate your agency and add extra revenue to your bottom line. Best of all, I’ll guide you every step of the way. Within 30 days you could have new tested ideas for generating revenue that you can show to your clients.

But let me be clear - my tools are not for amateurs or those looking for shortcuts. Only continue reading if you’re serious about growing your agency and willing to put in the effort.

During our collaboration, you’ll receive:

  • Data insights into your customers’ deepest secrets

For example: identifying the lifespan of various content types and subscriber engagement and churn rates

  • Brandable analysis report

A plain English interpretation of the results and conclusion, brandable with your name and logo to share with your clients

  • 1-1 Consultation

1-1 consultation to go over your aims for a client and decide on next steps, followed by a discussion of the results so you understand what’s in your report.

Offer something new and valuable to your clients

Show them something they’ve never been offered before. Imagine being able to tell them about new opportunities they’ve been missing out on, strategies they’d not considered until you told them, and untapped revenue they just left on the table.

Yes, my services are not cheap. A typical 30-day workthrough costs approx £2k. But you’ll likely make it back in client revenue on each and every project. Plus, you’ll have a competitive advantage that other agencies don’t.

I’ve had the privilege of working with some of the biggest names in the pharmaceutical industry, including

  • Amgen

  • GlaxoSmithKline

  • UCB Pharma

  • Schwarz Pharma, and more.

My focus on delivering fast and accurate results has earned me a reputation as a trusted partner for businesses looking to leverage their existing data to drive revenue and attract new clients.
